multiplex / multiplex.ua

Movie tickets from the most popular cinema network in Ukraine are now at your fingertips! Being the largest Ukrainian movie theatre chain, Multiplex can boast of a whopping 15 000 seats in 22 theaters throughout the country. Interpretator team developed a top-notch mobile application that makes it super easy for 20 000 guests daily to buy tickets in any Multiplex theatre on the go.

The app

Our client wanted a mobile solution that would cater to everything their guests could possibly need from locating the nearest cinema and checking movie showtimes to buying tickets from the palm of their hands. We developed a superior yet simple mobile experience that is smooth and intuitive. The Multiplex app is extremely handy whether you just want to discover new movies or get tickets skipping the lines in theaters.

No hassling with paper tickets

  • Search for cinema locations
  • Select your favourite seats
  • Purchase tickets right from the app with the credit card
  • Fast and simple checkout with Masterpass**
  • Return tickets in one click
  • The barcode can be scanned directly from the phone
  • All tickets are stored in the app and in Wallet*

Stay in the know of what’s on and coming

  • Scroll the feed to see which movies are playing now
  • Watch trailers and descriptions of movies coming soon
  • Use filters to pick what’s right for you
  • Check the showtimes and choose what suits you most
  • App will remind you about movie start through push-notifications

Cool perks for an outstanding experience

  • Collect points and get rewards with a loyalty program**
  • Order and pay for snacks and drinks from the app**
  • Ivnvite friends to a movie via iMessage app *

We have trully enjoyed working with Interpretator team. They didn't just give us what we asked for but worked to improve the app in countless ways. I wouldn't hesitate to work with them in future.

LAUNCHED ON IOS AND ANDROID PLATFORMS

Since its release the app has been enjoying huge success and collecting enthusiastic reviews from both iOS and Android users.
